item.description:
@nikolaww3 wrote:

hey how do i make it save my house i made
and when you teleport to the house how can i make it sepreat from every1 else cuz they spawn at the same spot/ house

anyone got portal id? any kind of portal bh is great and object id

i found where u make object

case 28164: if (!c.inCons()) { c.sM("You have to be in a construction area to make this object !"); } if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000) return; if (c.playerLevel[21] >= 1 && c.inCons() && c.playerHasItem(995, 10000)) { if (c.chat == 0) { c.sM("you build a very strong wall"); } but now where i put save?
